column1: '''Manfred Zimmermann''' is a German author, professor and lecturer.

In 1978 Zimmermann completed his doctorate in German Philology at the University of Marburg,<ref>Manfred Zimmermann: ''Die Sterzinger Miszellaneen-Handschrift'', Göppingen 1980 (preface)</ref> where he worked as a Lecturer at the Institute for Medieval German Philology.<ref>''Zeitschrift fur deutsches Altertum und deutsche Literatur'' 111 (1982), p. 145</ref> Today, Manfred Zimmermann works as an Associate Professor for Medieval German Studies at the [[Wikipedia:McMicken College of Arts and Sciences (A&s)
column2: McMicken College of Arts and Sciences]] of the [[Wikipedia:University of Cincinnati
column6: website=[http://www.artsci.uc.edu/.html McMicken College of Arts and Sciences]
